mapper.sql: orderID, studentID, orderTime, orderDate, orderBreakfast, orderLA, orderLB, orderLC, orderLCOLA, orderLSP, orderLRICE, orderSA, orderSB, orderSC, orderSCOLA, orderSSP, orderSRICE
mapper.select:
select
from TOrder where studentID = #{studentid,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by orderDate desc

select
from TOrder where studentID = #{studentid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and datediff(orderDate,#{orderdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})=0

select orderID, studentID, orderTime, orderDate, orderBreakfast, orderLA, orderLB, orderLC, orderLCOLA, orderLSP, orderLRICE, orderSA, orderSB, orderSC, orderSCOLA, orderSSP, orderSRICE, student_Name, student_Room, room_Position, student_College from TOrder INNER JOIN TStudent ON TOrder.studentID = TStudent.student_ID where TOrder.orderDate = #{orderdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} order by room_Position,student_Room

select orderID, student_Name, student_Room, room_Position, student_College from TStudent LEFT JOIN TOrder ON TStudent.student_ID = TOrder.studentID and datediff(TOrder.orderDate,#{orderdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})=0 order by room_Position,student_Room
